headline: Auschwitz Survivors Warn Against Silence in Face of New Perils
abstract: Organizers sought to put a spotlight on the stories of survivors, as this may be the last time that such a large number will be able to gather in one place.
lead_paragraph: AUSCHWITZ-BIRKENAU, Poland â€” They wore scarves emblazoned with their prisoner numbers, the same ones tattooed on their arms. Many were frail, walking only with the support of friends or relatives.
keywords: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
